attributes.action: To use the money proposed for new nuclear power stations to allow every household to invest in renewable energy, for example installing solar panels.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nuclear energy is a long term, expensive option with some potential unknown, future risks. Existing technology can offer every household (+ new builds) quick and instant access to renewable energy, for example all year round solar energy. It is possible that the government could finance such a nation wide project, achieving quick results, for similar amounts of money currently being allocated to long-term nuclear proposals.
